name: makostacks Retro RePlay
description:
Each folder contains one of the first three web games, I (Robert Young) ever created and these three were games that were the inspiration for the makostacks Games Division's creation.

Game Contents: The Folder contains three game: A Point and Click Game, A Pong Game and Chase Game.

Play Instructions: Click on one of the three Folders containing one of the three games, and then double-click it and press index. It should open it via a web browser.

Optional: Every Folder contains a Story of TXT file. If you want to know the back story behind that game open that file.
